attributes.action: stop privatizing the NHS and not to make GP surgerys open longer whith out extra funding
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
the proposed goverment plans to make GP surgerys open for longer hours whith out extra funding will compromize patient care. if the goverment wants GP surgerys open longer hours he can provide them whith the adiquet funding to do so. 

By allowing big companies like tesco to open GP surgerys and share holders have a say in patient care is a form of privitising the NHS through the back door.
